Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1974...
Injured on 5/8/1979 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 8/30/1979 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1983, off Raymond Spohn (SHP)...
Earned first career win on 8/19/1983...
Traded from Wisconsin to Syracuse on 3/2/1984 (Going to SYR: CF L. Batts, P J. Poon. Going to WIS: P R. Najera, C C. Mayes)...
Injured on 6/7/1985 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/7/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Injured on 4/1/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
